name: Project Nighthawk
description:
If you have come to this page then thank you for your interest! Project Nighthawk is not the official name. This was a passion project of mine. There is only one track in version 0.1.1. If you like it then please share! 

The controls are simple. Use W, A, D, or Left, Up, Down on your keyboard. If you have an Xbox controller that should work also. Up on Left Stick and X, B buttons to turn.  Spacebar or Select restarts the level. Esc or start pauses the screen. Use FullScreen to toggle on and off. 

There is no win scenario as the game restarts after 2 minutes. Can you beat the Red Drone!!!???
